description:
LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION
My place is close to Museum of the Moving Image, United Artists Kaufman Astoria 14, Villa Brazil Café & Grill1w3q, Subway station R,M.  You’ll love my place because of the light, the coziness, amazing location. You are one block from subway station and 10 min from midtown Manhattan. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Cozy apartment on perfect location
review: Maja and her husband were great hosts, very responsive. Communication and check-in were easy. Their home was larger than expected and though I wondered how a pull out couch would work for sleeping, it was very comfortable and a great night's rest.  Very safe and convenient walk to restaurants in Queens. We'll return.
